Class IFDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobi.inventica.ifinitysdk.managers.IFDataManager

  • public class IFDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class IFDataManager, used for authenticating user, querying and parsing data from geos.zone API

      • authenticateWithClientID

        public void authenticateWithClientID(java.lang.String clientId,
                                     java.lang.String clientSecret)
        This method authenticates user using his client ID and secret
        Parameters:
        clientId - the client id
        clientSecret - the client secret

      • isTokenExpired

        public boolean isTokenExpired()
        This method checks if your autorization token is expired
        Returns:
        true if it's still active, false if it's expired

      • queryContent

        public java.lang.String queryContent(int contentId)
        this method downloads HTML content, using content ID applied to specific area
        Parameters:
        contentId - the ID of the content
        Returns:
        html string, ready for loading into WebView

      • queryData

        public void queryData(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                      Context context,
                      OnQueryData listener)
        this method is used to query data from geos.zone API
        Parameters:
        params - HashMap containg name-value pairs: "lat" - GPS latitude, "lng" - GPS longitude, "distance" - radius in kilometers
        context - current application context
        listener - OnQueryData interface
